item.title: NoSQL- A quick guide
item.description: NoSQL is buzz word now-a-days among the developers and software professionals. What is NoSQL? NoSQL database, also called Not Only SQL, is an approach to data management and database design that’s useful for very large sets of distributed data. Where to use NoSQLÂ ? Use NoSQL, When project has unstructured big data that require real-time or offline analysis or web/mobile application. i.e. Social Network app, Analytics app. Advantages and Disadvantages of NoSQL DB.
